  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging used by com.telenav.kivakit.core
    Class
    Description
    Broadcaster
    Broadcasts a message to zero or more listeners via Broadcaster.transmit(Transmittable).
    Listener
    Handles messages through Listener.onMessage(Message).
    MessageTransceiver
    Methods that transmit different kinds of messages.
    Repeater
    A repeater is both a Listener and a Broadcaster, receiving messages in Repeater.receive(Transmittable) and rebroadcasting them to its own listeners with Transmitter.transmit(Transmittable).
    Transceiver
    Functionality that is common to Broadcasters, Listeners, Repeaters and potentially other classes that are involved in handling messages.

  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging used by com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging
    Class
    Description
    Broadcaster
    Broadcasts a message to zero or more listeners via Broadcaster.transmit(Transmittable).
    Debug
    Note: For a detailed discussion, see KivaKit Debugging Documentation
    Listener
    Handles messages through Listener.onMessage(Message).
    Message
    An interface to retrieve the basic attributes of a message, find out what it means and format it as text.
    Message.OperationStatus
    The meaning of a message if it represents a state change in the lifecycle of an operation
    Message.Status
    The meaning of a message if it relates to the current step in an ongoing operation
    MessageFilter
    Filters Transmittable objects down to Messages only
    MessageFormat
    Specifies what kind of formatting to apply to a message
    MessageTransceiver
    Methods that transmit different kinds of messages.
    Repeater
    A repeater is both a Listener and a Broadcaster, receiving messages in Repeater.receive(Transmittable) and rebroadcasting them to its own listeners with Transmitter.transmit(Transmittable).
    Transceiver
    Functionality that is common to Broadcasters, Listeners, Repeaters and potentially other classes that are involved in handling messages.
